reviews.review: Správná arkádová střílečka jak se patří. Hra i po několika letech není mrtvá a stále zábavná, bohužel česká komunita téměř vymizela. Hře dávám 8/10.

мне нравится team-frotress 2. (да возможно это звучит как школьник) но её проблемы могут немного порушить её. но если немного посмотреть под другим углом то возможно team-fortress 2. может остаться популярной и посей день

Valve please make your game playable. I love this game but this is just unplayable and sad. It have a lot of bots and buggy cosmetics, badly designed new maps, "NO MAJOR UPTADE" , badly desinged skins and cosmetics, lots of exploits etc. this issues makes game unplayable and hard to have fun. Teeam Fortress 2 isn't a bad game it just needs some help.

I would recommend TF2 to other players for it's amazing art and design, along with the ganeplay, but I do have some complains, TF2 has not been updated in a very long time and Bots have started to invade the game and mostly make it unplayable unless you manage to kick them out, the vote kicks don't work

El nem hiszem hogy "nem tetszik"-et nyomok egy Valve játékra...

Röviden:
Belépek egy sima meccsbe, minden okés, de ha ezt egy Competitive-el teszem akkor még kezd a játék szétszakadni?? Ezzel azt értem, hogy ahogy rányomok a Joinra a játék már egyből elkezdi a Source-os hülyeségét avagy a kép befagy néha-néha megindul és egy frame-nyi hangot játszik újra és újra. Egész meccs alatt ez van!

Igazából bármit ami nem Compettve azt tudom játszani, de köszöntem szépen, hogy legalább a Valve Complete Pack-ben ingyenes a játék. Maradjon is az! Már ügy vagyok, hogy nem épp emiatt a játék miatt veszek új gépet, hanem CS:GO és Left 4 Dead miatt. Na meg talán egy pár nem Valve játék, de semmiképpen sem a tf2-őt fogom fő oknak mondani.

GG, Valve
egy játékos egy darabig elvesztettél
Ну это там инженер он ставит турель, порталы, кулер с патронами и хилом. И ты это там побеждаешь

Team Fortress 2 is a game unlike none other. Inspiring the team based combat formula, Team Fortress 2 is a fun & competitive experience. The game has very balanced combat with each class having their own strengths & weaknesses. Plus with the game's more emphasis on comedy, I believe it gives it so much more personality than other team based shooters. Overall, the game is amazing, & you should definitely give it a try.

This game is amazing, one of the best fps i've ever played. A true masterpiece. however, I cannot recommend the game in its current state, the amount of bots in the game is ridiculous, and the only way to play 2 rounds without bots is either dream luck or community servers. If valve updates the game and gives us an actual anti bot update, i'll change this review, but we all know the only person working on tf2 is the dusty pan in the back of the room.

최근 나오는 캐주얼 슈팅 게임의 시초격이라고 할 수 있습니다.(옵치가 이 게임을 모티브로 만들었다고 하죠? 옵치2가 팀포2 표절했다고 논란이었던 적도 있고요.) 솔직히 아직도 재밌어요. 게임 자체가 많이 고였는데도.

One of my favorite games of all time and yet I can't recommend it to anyone in its current state. 

Horrible default settings, a joke of a matchmaking and competitive system, a flat out unfinished and bare-bones tutorial, previously free features locked behind paywalls, and servers swarming with cheaters/bots that will instantly ruin matches. TF2 has so many barriers for entry in a trial-by-fire setting that what's left in community servers is not worth it. It physically hurts to see such a beloved work of art be neglected, forgotten, and left for dead by its own company.
All i can really say is it's a really good free to play game if your into shooters
